hero.headline: Ship Real-World Web3 Products—Secure, Compliant, Fast
hero.subheadline: Tokenization, multi-sig treasuries, on-chain finance, user-owned social, and more—built on ICP, Ethereum/Base, and modern web.

assetTokenization.title: Asset Tokenization
assetTokenization.description: Turn real-world/digital assets into tokens for fractional ownership, instant settlement, and programmable rules.
assetTokenization.example: Tokenize a $2M property into 20,000 units; auto-distribute rent monthly.

multiSigWallet.title: Multi-Signature Wallet
multiSigWallet.description: Role-based limits, thresholds, time-locks; remove single-point risk, create audit trails.

communication.title: Communication & Social
communication.description: User-owned data in personal canisters/contracts; E2E chat, token-gated feeds, wallet/II login.
communication.example: Private Slack alternative with encrypted messages stored per user.

invoiceFactoring.title: Invoice Factoring
invoiceFactoring.description: Convert invoices to upfront cash via escrowed smart contracts; transparent risk for funders.
invoiceFactoring.example: $100k invoice, 85% advance; remainder released on payment minus fee.

crowdfunding.title: Crowdfunding
crowdfunding.description: Milestone escrows, refunds, vesting, governance voting, regional KYC gates.
crowdfunding.example: Pre-order launch with milestone-based fund releases.

nfts.title: NFTs & Fungible Tokens
nfts.description: Membership passes, loyalty tokens, royalties, allowlists, airdrops, analytics, anti-bot.
nfts.example: NFT membership with event access + resale royalties to treasury.

digitalSigning.title: Digital Signing
digitalSigning.description: Legally binding e-sign with hash/timestamp anchored on-chain; private PDFs, verifiable integrity.
digitalSigning.example: Board resolutions signed via wallet; verifiable unchanged later.

web3Email.title: Web3 Email
web3Email.description: Identity-linked inboxes, encryption, portable ownership, programmable filters.
web3Email.example: Investor relations inbox with exportable, verifiable comms.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: We translate Web3 into tangible outcomes for your vertical.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Fractional property tokens; rent distribution; multi-sig treasury.

smeFinance.title: SME Finance
smeFinance.description: On-chain invoice factoring; community working capital.

creators.title: Creators & Media
creators.description: NFT memberships; token-gated content; fan governance.

supplyChain.title: Supply Chain
supplyChain.description: Tokenized inventory/receipts; milestone-based payments; signed docs.

ngos.title: NGOs/DAOs
ngos.description: Transparent donations; milestone releases; multi-sig spend.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Tell us your goals. We'll suggest the fastest compliant path to value.

quokka.title: Quokka
quokka.description: Web3 platform for influencers/streamers & fans with rewards + NFTs; DAO on ICP for community-driven scam protection.
